newsitem.title: USA: Startronix says stocks in short selling.
newsitem.headline: Startronix says stocks in short selling.

text.p: StarTronix International Inc said on Tuesday that it will continue to suspend the conversion rights of holder of its convertible C preferred stock in order to stop the short selling of its stock.
The company said it has been in contact with the investor group that obtained a temporary restraining order freezing its clearing account.

It said no other company assets or operating funds were affected by this temporary order, and that its counsel and the bank's counsel had reviewed the order and determined it was without merit or effect.
"Management believes there has been concerted effort to drive down the price of the company's common stock to cover the short position of such persons," Chairman Greg Gilbert said in a statement.
